headline: Illinois American Water Invested Over $277 Million in System Upgrades Statewide in 2024
summary: BELLEVILLE, Ill. - Illinois American Water announced today its 2024 end-of-year investment total for system improvements. More than $277 million was invested to fund critical system upgrades and...
